price: Kandi tuba turi hafi ye kubarusha, ariko mwe ntimubibona.
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walākin lā tub'ṣirūna
